Html:
Hi, 

don't take me wrong, I appreciate your work, your giving to a community during your spare time, etc... and that's with similar spirit I and others submitted patches: give something back.

Nevertheless, last merged patch is dated December 2009; it makes one wonder whether there is a point submitting a patch at all.
Of course, I know an administrator can reject a patch, but at least - please - give us a feedback :-(

Again, thank you for your time and your effort.

Federico
